Sentencas: Substantial interest has recently been generated by rare earth cobaltate compounds as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: We have synthesised a wide range of single-phase perovskite-based rare earth cobaltates (Ln(1-x)Sr(x)CoO(3-delta))
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates
Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: A combination of electron and X-ray diffraction of these phases reveals a complex family of tetragonal and orthorhombic superstructures.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: The nature of structural and magnetic ordering relies on both cation and oxygen vacancy distribution.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: Phase boundaries exists between compounds containing large, medium and small rare earths (between Nd3+ and Sm3+, and also between Gd3+ and Dy3+) and also at different Sr-doping levels.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: Powder neutron diffraction has been used in conjunction with the other techniques to reveal cation and oxygen vacancy ordering within these materials.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: These phases show mixed valence (3+/4+) cobalt oxidation states that increases with Sr content.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates

Sentencas: A range of magnetic behaviours has been observed, including ordered antiferromagnetism at elevated temperatures (> 300 K) in Ho0.2Sr0.8CoO2.75.
Titulo: Structure and magnetism in rare earth strontium-doped cobaltates
